column2: divide a single physical object into constituent parts
column3: divide a set of elements into groups
column5: isolate constituent parts of a non-physical object

column7: to give part of something to somebody else

column10: to cut or sever something, typically into two or more parts

column13: to split or separate something forcefully

column16: to separate or part something into pieces
